entries.player_sorry_4: If I had it, I'd tell you, okay?  Have some patience.
entries.player_reset_4: To tell you the truth, I wasn't going to really do it.  I was just playing with you.
entries.player_2_4: Are you kidding?  I just wanted to ask about it, not actually do it.
entries.player_1_4: Yeah, I'll handle this for you.
entries.npc_work_4: So, do you have the datadisc?
entries.npc_reward_4: This datadisc looks damaged. If it ain't readable, you owe me some money.
entries.npc_reset_4: Stop doing that! You're driving me crazy with that!
entries.npc_backtowork_4: Understood.  I hope you have some patience as I get around to serving you.  Maybe that datadisc might speed me up, eh?
entries.npc_4_4: You ask a lot of questions. It's an order from Valarian to take out Jabba's lieutenant. I figure this'll get me in good with the Hutt.
entries.npc_3_4: Stop doing that! You're driving me crazy with that!
entries.npc_2_4: Here are the Nikto's coordinates. Don't hesitate when you see him. Just start blasting. And don't forget that datadisc.
entries.npc_1_4: I need you to take out a Nikto enforcer. He's carrying an encrypted datadisc. I need you to bring that back to me. Can you handle that?
entries.dontknowyou_4: Oh, you're not a slug.  Sorry.  Didn't mean to insult you there.
entries.dontknowyou_3: Don't worry.  I'm not interested in killing you.  Get out of here before I change my mind.
entries.player_sorry_3: No, but I will soon.  Don't worry.
entries.player_sorry_2: Not yet, but I'll get dismantle it before it turns in the report.
entries.player_reset_3: I've changed my mind.  I'm going to get a drink instead.
entries.player_reset_2: I stopped by to tell you that I'm not interested in doing this anymore.
entries.npc_reset_3: I hate when you do that.
entries.npc_reset_2: It really annoys me when you ask about a job then refuse it. Just so you know.
entries.npc_backtowork_3: Unless you have that vial, get out of my cantina.
entries.npc_backtowork_2: Until you break that thing in two, stop wasting my time.
entries.npc_breech_3: I can kill you with a touch!
entries.npc_breech_2: This is an Imperial matter. Do not interfere.
entries.npc_breech_1: You can't prove I poisoned those tourists! Die!
entries.npc_work_3: Do you have the vial on you?
entries.npc_work_1: Did you get that recipe for me?
entries.dontknowyou_1: Then again, you don't even know what I'm talking about, do you?  Nevermind.
entries.cantwork: Talk to me when you're not busy.
entries.npc_reset_1: Why are you wasting my time? I got customers to serve.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Until you get it, stop wasting my time.
entries.player_sorry_1: I haven't found him yet.  I'll let you know when I have.
entries.player_reset_1: I've changed my mind.  I'm not interested in doing this any more.
entries.player_2_2: No, I don't really care after all.
entries.player_2_1: I don't care about this Bothan.  I'm not interested.
entries.npc_reward_3: I'll analyze this stuff tonight. Might come in handy.
entries.npc_reward_1: We'll see if this was worth the price I paid.
entries.npc_4_3: Some new type of chall poison. Veenos specializes in toxins.
entries.npc_4_2: They just take up space and they notice stupid little details. Like anyone cares.
entries.npc_4_1: Claimed it could shrivel the ears off a gundark.
entries.npc_3_3: I hate when you do that.
entries.npc_3_2: It really annoys me when you ask about a job then refuse it. Just so you know.
entries.npc_3_1: Why are you wasting my time? I got customers to serve.
entries.npc_2_3: Make sure you don't break the seal on that vial. Get it on your skin and you can kiss yourself goodbye.
entries.npc_2_2: Good. And bring me its verbobrain, just in case.
entries.npc_2_1: The slug's name is Baal Vurr'kya. You can find him at these coordinates. Keep it quiet.
entries.npc_1_3: There's a Twi'lek named Veenos Thrax that has something I want. It's a small sealed vial. Think you can get it?
entries.npc_1_2: I hate droids. Do you hate 'em? 'Cuz I sure do. One of those blasted RA-7 inspection droids just left. I don't think it was too impressed. Think you can stop that hunk of metal before it makes its report?
entries.npc_1_1: Sure, I got a job for you. A Bothan came in here a few days ago, bragging about a drink he invented. He waved the recipe in my face, laughed, then took off. No one does that to me. Get me that recipe.
